website_summaries.verdict: Nice option if your ears are hard to fit.
pros: Comes with a complete range of accessories, including both silicone and memory foam tips, fins, and clips so you can adjust for your own comfort
Plays up to 12.5 hours on a charge
Gives you an extra hour from a short 10-minute charge
cons: Some users note these earbuds have a lower volume than others

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE! Anker sent replacment set!
customer_reviews.text: Update. Anker responded to my review with several suggestions to restore the right earbud but the fixes didn"t work. A very nice CSR named Shelly emailed me and said they were sending a replacement set. Got it right away. I still like how comfortable they are and am so happy I have a working set. Nice to see a company so responsive and helpful! (Original Review: Right earbud quit working after 6 mos. of very occasional use. Comfortable tho...and easy to connect. They WERE my favorites!)
customer_reviews.author: dsm

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these for the gym! I had a pair of wired Bose but kept snagging the wire and dropping my phone. The 12+ hr batter life is amazing. I have another pair of bluetooth but don't use them that much because of the minimal batter life. The sound quality is pretty good. Not quite bose quality but actually not that far from it. There are numerous tips and mushroom looking things to adjust the size perfectly to fit your ear. Even running on a treadmill these stay in place and I rarely adjust them. Another great product from Anker, a brand I've grown to trust.
customer_reviews.author: JeepDad33

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this headphones if you want to use them during marathon or very long runs
customer_reviews.text: Worthless! They just stopped working during a long run. Initially thought they ran out of battery. They won't turn on after trying g several times. Avoid this headphones if you want to use them during marathon or very long runs April 10th 2018 update. Gotta say Anker's customer support rocks. After my initial review Anker sent me a second pair free of charge. Hopefully this second pair will work as expected. September 12th, 2018 update. Second pair that Anker gave me just died on me. I use this for regular running and I am guessing they are not suitable for regular exercise. Totally disappointed by this product
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Positives out weigh the negetives
customer_reviews.text: For the money its very worth it. Positivea: 1.Definitely noise isolating because you cannot not hear the outside world with these. 2. Very loud ( maybe too loud) and clear sound. 3. They do not fall off at all. 4.Beautiful color! Negatives: 1.They could be a little more comfortable and i say that because they cause mild sweating in the ears at times. 2.the mic could slightly be better doesn't always pick up one's voice.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Runner loves them; no issues with falling out of ears
customer_reviews.text: These Anker were my first wireless headphones; I use them for my daily runs and am now hooked. I love them! I was apprehensive to try since earbuds tend to fall out during my runs but the soft clip goes over my ears and is very secure. The sound is very clear and I no longer have issues with pulling on wires/cords. These were the least expensive of the headphones and i have not had any problems with them....of course I’ve only had them for a month, but am already recommending them to someone. Anker was great too because the original ETA was one week; they arrived the next day! No more wires to deal with!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: Decent ear buds for the price. Sound quality is pretty good. My only issue is the way they fit around and in the ears. They tend to not fit well and pop out slightly so affects the sound, quality, and a bit annoying having to readjust them.
customer_reviews.author: Always Hoping

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality not up to par...but customer service is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it goes around your ear which helps them not fall off. The issues I have with it.... I don’t find the sound to be good at all. It sounds like it’s coming from far away and it’s not loud enough. Also the sizes for the earbuds are too large for my small ear canals. It’s hard to find ones that are extra small. I was hoping these would work for me. Unfortunately based on the sound I would not recommend them. update: after reviewing this, the seller emailed me and offered a refund. i am impressed that they got in touch with me without me even contacting them. i received a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: rg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I can watch news and videos in bed without disrupting my husband’s sleep. When I first tested it out while he was awake, it was pretty loud and the sound quality is quite good. I asked if he could hear it and was shocked to see him shake his head no! I also like the earbuds because unlike the more expensive Apple earbuds, they fit snug and comfortably, and also cancel out surrounding noise (like a snoring husband). I look forward to using these for air travel too!
customer_reviews.author: nomdecrayola

customer_reviews.title: Cheap,durable and great sound!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing for the price. Sound is great and the battery life is just as good. What impressed me most about these headphones is the durability. I missed placed them and ended up washing them along with my workout jacket. Out of curiosity I checked to see if they would turn on and they did. The sound quality was the same as before. Nothing but amazing products from Anker. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Superb bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure: I guess I'm an Anker junkie. I won't buy any products they make from anyone else. I'll keep this short as there are already so many good reviews here. They're great, you can't beat the price, although we did when they were ten bucks off one day and I bought a blue for myself and a red pair (they're more orangy) for my wife. She took the blue, but that's another story. The sound and battery life are fantastic. Phone call quality is excellent. They're packaged with an extraordinary amount of extra ear and canal size pieces. Take a minute to read the specs and included extras.
customer_reviews.author: mikefeuer

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable trade between fidelity and cost
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a trade between cost and sound fidelity. They are incredibly affordable for Bluetooth headphones yet reproduce sounds with average fidelity, resulting in a surprisingly good sound with some distortion on the lower end. If you’re looking to cut the cord at an affordable price, especially in an environment where high fidelity is optional, I recommend these headphones. Myself, I purchased my Anker Soundbuds for running, as my over-the-ear Bose were too bulky and hot. Some reviews stated a limited range, however I could get 10 m (30 ft) of separation between my iPad and Soundbuds without dropout. Pairing (and repairing) was easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased twice. Broke twice.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones twice. Both times they broke, i.e. stopped working in one ear or both, within months. Granted that I gifted them to my pre-teen daughter both times and she tends to go hard on accessories, but still. Why are these things suddenly not working after a few months? Anker is generally a great brand and makes great products, but it seems they haven't found their sweet spot in making durable and affordable headphones. I hope they figure it out soon.
customer_reviews.author: NiftyNeil

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone for the price tag
customer_reviews.text: After getting frustrated by the third apple headphone that stopped working (one with cord, not bluetooth), I was looking for alternatives. I didn't want to dish out a lot of money, and wanted something reliable. I bought this based on the good reviews, and it's definitely better than expected. Sound quality is ok, and the battery life is ok too. Battery does get used up faster if you are having long phone calls, just FYI. Overall, good quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: passbreakpoints

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Wow....I’m a avid gym goer searching for the right pair of Bluetooth ear buds and I wear glasses. I’ve tried several different pairs, ME Audio which I still use, Gripped Fitness, Skull Candy and I have to say that Anker knocked it out of the park....$30!!! Sound quality exceptional, quality superb!!! You can’t go wrong with these at all plus look at everything that comes with them....Anker, standing ovation!!! I’ll be hitting the gym on February 14th for a test run and I will come back for another review of how functional they are...thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius Rushin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Long battery. Not very loud or much bass
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a nice rigid ear hook, so they stay in place. The tips are very comfortable even when listening for a couple hours. They will last me an entire week working out every day. The only reason for Four stars instead of Five is that the volume isn't as powerful as some other ear hook headphone I've used. There isn't a lot of bass in comparison either. For reference: I can turn the volume up all the way on these and be comfortable, whereas on some other headphones 75% volume is painfully loud.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, does what it says on the label
customer_reviews.text: Great value, surprisingly good sound regardless of price; I use them when running and they perform great. No problems getting them wet either. The foam tips insulate nearly as well as foam earplugs which means I can use them for hearing protection / listen to podcasts while working with power tools!
customer_reviews.author: P. Tcholakov

customer_reviews.title: there is no possible way to run comfortably with these
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound and the fit was okay, to say the least. However, there is no possible way to run comfortably with these. Even with the little clip to adjust the length of the cord, there was no compromisable setting to get the cord to not knock my neck while running. If you're lifting weights, sure these earbuds will suit you fine, but if you are doing any kind of running at all, these are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Were great until they suddenly stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones. After searching for a lightweight comfortable easy to use Bluetooth headphones and I got these on a whim during an amazon deal of the day. They were everything I wanted! I ran in them, did HIIT, yoga, you name it. Until just a few days ago they let out a loud beep and just died. I thought they needed to be recharged so I did that but now they won’t even turn on! UPDATE: customer service was incredibly helpful and replaced my headphones with ease. I’ve had the new pair for about a month now and haven’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Its good! But always room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: They make good gym buds, but if you are an audiophile these arent it. I use these when im sweating and dying at the gym but not for just casual listening cause they dont have the quality I seek. Overall amazing earbuds for rough use. The customer service is always on top of things! I had a defective product the first go around and they sent me a new one the next day. Cannot praise them enough for that.
customer_reviews.author: Qazi Islam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones. Don’t be skeptical.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. No doubt now these are fantastic. I bought them to replace my jabra sport paces. They looked similar and I prefer the over the ear hold. They sound amazing. Have an excellent fit in the ear. Includes multiple pieces to change and customize the fit. Very good sound quality. Extremely happy. Hands down would purchase again compared to bigger name competition prices.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I use them everywhere and it works like a charm. I like that the makers kept in mind there are different ear hole sizes so they provided varying plug sizes. Nothing worse than huge ear pieces that fall out when you shift. The sound is pretty good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds and outstanding problem support!
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these earbuds, comfortable and battery lasts a long time. After a couple months one of the buds stopped working, Anker support responded immediately to email request, collected a bit of info and right away sent a replacement set! I have bought many Anker products and have been very pleased with products and support.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great...and then stopped but Anker Customer Support Stepped Up
customer_reviews.text: This latest set lasted less than 2 months. The headphones stay powered on and will not switch off or pair with my iPhone. I let the battery drain to 0% in the hopes that when I charged the set it would be fixed, but this did not solve the problem. After posting my dissatisfaction Anker customer support was extremely fast in reaching out, troubleshooting, and sending a brand new replacement pair of headphones. The defective pair was shipped back at Anker's expense and should just be a one off defect and the new pair works great.
customer_reviews.author: Thushan Perera

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I got these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got these headphones. They can last me well into the next day even if I don't charge them. Charging is a breeze being that these charge fully within a full hour and 30 minutes and the fact that they last at least 12 hours. I cant get that with any other brand of headphones of this size and quality. Honestly, these are a great investment whether you use them on your commute to work, going to the gym, or even both you'll be just fine with these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... Bluetooth earphone and quickly wanted to get another with better sound quality
customer_reviews.text: changed my review after it stopped working 10 months after I started using it. Giving it 3 stars just because it had good quality while it worked. Not sure what happened to the power button all of sudden, no red or blue light indicators working. Looking for a replacement now.
customer_reviews.author: SSingh

customer_reviews.title: NOT good for RUNNING
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair after I lost my soundbuds nb10 which were great for running but the sound quality was lacking, although the Curve has the superior sound quality they are poor running headphones I have tried all three pairs of wing tips and bud sizes and yet they still fall out while running. But if you're looking for something that has good sound quality while lifting or climbing while still being affordable these are not bad it's unfortunate because I really do like Anker products.
customer_reviews.author: Sufyan Sohail

customer_reviews.title: All around functionality
customer_reviews.text: I workout in these. I do yard work in these. They have good sound quality and great noise reduction. People can understand me when I talk. I can understand them. They fit well. Battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Justice

customer_reviews.title: These are great wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great wireless headphones, particularly for the price. Good sound quality, minimal interference. The only thing issue I've had with them is that the rubber piece of the ear bud itself comes off very easily and I have lost three since I purchased them,
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THESE.
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THESE... However, the bass is very poor and the sound is rather tinny... This makes me sad since I did a ton of research before buying and others did not feel that way about these headphones. So, maybe I have a lemon pair? from - Sandy in Seattle
customer_reviews.author: BlondeMom

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a while
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about two months...could be a little louder...not loud enough to drown out the crap they play at the gym. Was pretty happy about them till they went kaput today.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Earphones stopped working a short while after buying them. Anker customer service sent another one free of charge and they've been working great. Really great customer service with extremely fast response times. Overall, the material quality is great, they don't slip off when running or when sweaty, sound quality is pretty decent considering they're wireless and they have a fairly long battery life. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good sound
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. lightweight and easy to use. My only concern is that the cable could be about 2-4" longer. When I hang it around teh back of my neck, it can be a bit restrictive if it shifts one direction.
customer_reviews.author: Aliem L. Jumpp

customer_reviews.title: You Really Can’t Beat Them for The Price!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good with my new Anker’s!! I use them mainly for running, they fit great and there’s little wind noise. If you’re like me and frugal with money and don’t want to spend the money on high end eat phones, then I would suggest trying these out. Sound could be a little better, but all in all they’re actually really good ear phones. You really can’t beat them for the price... I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: James Ryder

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is amazing, and the battery like is really good
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing, and the battery like is really good. They're light, and overall just really good earbuds. I had a problem where the first pair I got stopped working, and customer service was really responsive and got a replacement in 3 days of making the complaint. I did notice if you get the inline volume changer/charger wet, it will start to cut in and out/disconnect. Overall, for the price, still a great pair of earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schgier

customer_reviews.title: They are very light and comfortable. Easy to pair with my phone and Ipad
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe the crisp, clear sound out of these earbuds. They are very light and comfortable. Easy to pair with my phone and Ipad. Awesome and the price is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Girl

customer_reviews.title: So far so good they cancel out surrounding noise and fit my ears ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these to workout, work in the garage and the yard. So far so good they cancel out surrounding noise and fit my ears perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyne Flatt

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with my head phones, and when contacting their customer service team, Shelly was a huge help. She walked me through the steps to determine what was wrong and eventually sent out a new pair as the red ones I had purchased were defective. She made every effort to assist and I appreciate the effort she put in. I'll definitely be considering Anker on several other purchases in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Clever Name

customer_reviews.title: MOST AMAZING EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have the best sound, design, connectivity and incredible bass. They come with so many extra earpiece sizes. But most of all is the AMAZING customer service by Anker. 3 of the 4 pairs I ordered worked up to standard. The 4th pair, which didn't work was replaced in the most hassle free customer service I've ever seen. You are garunteed the quality Anker stands by.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Malin

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I use these to work out and after more than a year they still work like new. For the price these are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Noriega

customer_reviews.title: These are a must and amazing for a gift or for yourself
customer_reviews.text: You can't come here these head phones at this price point sound quality, price, battery life easier tio/wing options color. These are a must and amazing for a gift or for yourself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: flawless
customer_reviews.text: absolutely perfect, i'd go through apple headphones like crazy and these cost just as much and they sound better, provide better noise cancellation than my $200 beats headphones, and last well over 12 hours on full volume, absolutely perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: broden r.

customer_reviews.title: Works great the other party can hear me even when I whisper.
customer_reviews.text: They are fabulous comfortable works great, people can hear me good even if I speak low. I love them so much I am buying all the kids one so they will stop stealing mine.
customer_reviews.author: JODA

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these headphones for about two years now and they are still my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great product, awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Great sound for short money. About 8 months in the right bud stopped working, and they sent me a free replacement, they only asked that I do a bit of troubleshooting first to see if I could fix the issue. Two thumbs way up!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds worked perfectly for the first four uses. After that, it stopped working completely and now it's too late to return/exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amy V

customer_reviews.title: Over a year of use and still working great
customer_reviews.text: Use them all the time. Will charge quick and charge last forever. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Anker product line.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was very good. They are comfortable. Button controls are very convenient and useful. Paired easily with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: K. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Made with quality materials, and connect to any device fast. Battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike the tiger

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very solid for the price. When working correctly, the battery can last for an entire week of gym sessions without having to worry about charging. Fit secure and don't bounce around while running. Anker also provides prompt customer service if you have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Worked great out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Received a week ago. Worked great out of the box. Stays in/on the ears well - lots of fit options. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JBW

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service/warranty
customer_reviews.text: Anker’s customer service is amazing. My headphones randomly stopped working and I emailed customer service. They responded quickly and they sent me a new set after trying some troubleshooting. I only gave them 4 stars since the original headphones broke after 2-3 months of use which is hopefully not normal but I couldn’t give a perfect 5/5 because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miekstyn

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds. The only complaint is that they don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Great earbuds. The only complaint is that they don't get super loud but most people won't mind that "flaw" (if you can even call it that). The fit is great, and the sound quality is pretty solid as well.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds worked great for 3-4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds worked great for 3-4 uses, then right ear suddenly died. Anker has been contacted. Will update rating when/if I receive a satisfactory replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W. Bax

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price point. I only have 4 stars because there is no way to tell the charge left.
customer_reviews.author: william pickle

customer_reviews.title: Battery life no more than 4 hours
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is no more than 4 hours, even though they claim it is far longer.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: The product broke but anker sent me a new one
customer_reviews.text: I liked these a lot until the stopped working after 5 months. Anker sent me a new pair
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Mclemore

customer_reviews.title: Very good and cheap wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Although the first pair of Soundbuds I bought stopped holding a charge, when I contacted customer service they were happy to send me a replacement to fulfill the 18-month warranty coverage. They are easy to use and hold up to use, very handy for using at the gym or running, or simply to enjoy some music.
customer_reviews.author: ArcLight5

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lite weight and comfortable but the sound volume is horrible. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is impeccable!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So comfortable & convenient to workout with!! I ordered 2 of these! My boyfriend loves his too! He actually wears them mowing grass & can hear his music wide open!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: A trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: love everything about this BT Earphones, from quality sound and the brand, great price. I bought 2 for my family household. Great customer service. thank you ANKERDIRECT
customer_reviews.author: Danete

customer_reviews.title: Great Buds
customer_reviews.text: These work great but can be a bit awkward to get used to waring and putting on.
customer_reviews.author: ChaosGod

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Music started skipping and won't hold charger after only two days use very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, worked fine, then a while after I had it somehow, only one earbud worked then the whole ear piece came off, so now I just use it with one side in my ear and the broke string hanging on the side somewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. They don't fall out like regular ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set (keeping the other for home). Great sound is they don't fall out like regular ear buds. I would have given it a 5 except the this second set has about 7 hours of battery life whereas the first set runs for about 14 hours. Good buy, especially when on sale.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES M NANCE

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Not loud enough. Cannot hear movie dialogue on an airplane. Yes, I put the best fitting tips on.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: These headphones cancel put everything and allow me to focus when I am working out. Easy to use and the sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Still works months later
customer_reviews.text: Have worked perfectly for me since I bought them months ago. No issues with syncing or response. Audio is clear and buttons are easy to navigate and understand. Have never ran out of battery, but I recharge every few days at work.
customer_reviews.author: Ran

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working- prob best to find another option
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after about one month. Stopped taking a charge. Then they sent me a new pair. They worked. Charged no problem. Now I only have sound coming from one ear. Serious flaws here. I'm done with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound and replaced my noise cancelling phones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent bass and sound. I normally use nose cancelling Bose headphones on airplanes but I tried this for the first time in the plane. They provided excellent sound in the plane.
customer_reviews.author: WIMPLO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sounds it's on par with the big name brands, booming bass. Came fully charged
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Poor Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: They will break on just the other side of the product warranty period. Spend a little more on another product and get more reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Best Bluetooth under 50 bucks you can find and great customer service. I had an issue with one side of them after a few months and they just sent me another pair right away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better for the same price.
customer_reviews.text: I do not always write reviews. But these headphones are not the best for the price. The volume is a bit low and also a bit choppy/has moments of static when I increase the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Shalu

customer_reviews.title: Great value, low price!
customer_reviews.text: I got these earphones over 3 weeks ago and they are still working off just one charge! Awesome sound quality and noise canceling. So worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Mintun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for a family member and loved them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Costoso

customer_reviews.title: good design
customer_reviews.text: These work as well as the other Anker products that I use. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: jarod s davidson

customer_reviews.title: After using it for 3 or 4 times, just ...
customer_reviews.text: After using it for 3 or 4 times, just stopped to work. I'm really frustraded, but i got the refund at least.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kim

customer_reviews.title: It is a good head phone
customer_reviews.text: It is a good head phone, loud and all the parts is working, was expecting a long core though. It is long enough though, can try it...
customer_reviews.author: Glenroy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed. Product worked for 2 runs, then wouldn't charge.
customer_reviews.author: DORON PESSO

customer_reviews.title: Would not work.
customer_reviews.text: Would not power on or charge on arrival. Not a very reliable product it seems. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Won't charge after about 4 months of use under normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S. Rosenhauer II

customer_reviews.title: Pls Contact Me Anker
customer_reviews.text: Right Headphone Got Ripped Off The Whole Pair & Only Lasted 5 Months Which Isn’t Had But J Had Really High Hopes It’d Last Longer Then Most
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Sound is very low not happy. I love anker products and I'm very disappointed ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very low not happy. I love anker products and I'm very disappointed with these. I can get headphones for $15 that are louder.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am 77 and use these often. In fact I bought three for my teenage grandchildren and they love them too. They are easy to use, very comfortable and the sound quality is great!
